about_the_game:
The demo includes the beginning 20-30 minutes of the remade Close Your Eyes, none of the other game modes or other scenarios of the full package are available, but it can be good played as a a taste of the atmosphere through the beginning slice of the game, a performance test, and if you played the original to see a few changes in the remake.

The full game is quite a bit longer, it has other scenarios and modes (and a hub world to explore), and unlockables, surprises, and more to enjoy.

Five years after the original Ludum Dare game and over 3 & a half years since the Steam release, Close Your Eyes returns for its 5-year anniversary with a complete remake. The remake has been redone from the ground up, capturing the ominous feel of the original but with a ton of brand new content, an updated look, various alterations and additions, and a plethora of bonus modes and goodies.

The uprising cult hit about an adorable murderer bound by their past, brought into question by a strange game show host, returns in a brand new way! Completely remade from the ground up, it includes new locations, brand new threats, extended story, 10 possible endings, and a delve into an atmospheric abyss that may linger with you long after you beat it.

You're a murderer, we all know it, but do you think you are?

content_descriptors.notes: The game has some disturbing topics, themes, and imagery that may not be suitable for all audiences. The game includes themes of depression, suicide, and trauma.

short_description: The demo includes the beginning 20-30 minutes of the remade Close Your Eyes, the beginning of your descent into an atmospheric abyss. None of the other game modes or scenarios in the full remake are available, but is a good sampling of what one should expect from Close Your Eyes.
